Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00024 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_cda-ch_pa00023
Titel: CDA-CH Behandlungsliste L1
Titre: CDA-CH liste de treatments L1
Title tbd it: CDA-CH Lista trattamenti L1
Title: CDA-CH L1 list of treatments
Beschreibung: Die nachfolgenden Regeln beschreiben die Prüfungen zu den CDA-CH Behandlungsliste
Description: Les règles suivantes décrivent les contrôles sur la 'liste de treatments'
descritpiton tbd it: Le regole seguenti descrivono i controlli per la CDA-CH Lista trattamenti
Description: The following rules describe the tests on CDA-CH list of treatments
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1701_as00149 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: self::cda:procedure
Beschreibung: CDA-CH 'Behandlungen' müssen als 'procedure' im CDA Body deklariert werden (section 'Behandlungen')
Description: Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent être déclarés comme 'procedure' dans le CDA Body (section 'Treatments')
descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono essere dichiarate come 'observation' nel CDA Body (section 'Trattamenti')
Description: CDA-CH 'Treatments' must be declared as an 'Observation' in the CDA Body ('Treatments' section)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1702_as00150 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime
Beschreibung: CDA-CH 'Behandlungen' müssen ein den Durchführungszeitpunkt resp. -zeitraum enthalten
Description: Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent contenir le point de temps ou la période d'exécution
descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono contenere un punto del tempo o il periodo di attuazione
Description: CDA-CH 'Treatments' must contain a point of time or the period of the execution
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1703_as00151 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text
Beschreibung: CDA-CH 'Behandlungen' müssen einen narrativen Text enthalten
Description: Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent contenir un texte narratif
descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono contenere un testo narrativo
Description: CDA-CH 'Treatments' must contain a narrative text

Titel: CDA-CH Einzelne Behandlung L3
Titre: CDA-CH treatment individuel L3

Title: CDA-CH L3 single Treatment
Beschreibung: Die nachfolgenden Regeln beschreiben die Prüfungen zu einer Behandlung im Level 3
Description: Les règles suivantes décrivent les contrôles sur une treatment individuel
descritpiton tbd it: Le regole seguenti descrivono i controlli per una Trattamento Level 3
Description: The following rules describe the tests on a treatment in level 3

descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono essere dichiarate come 'observation' nel CDA Body (section 'Trattamenti')

descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono contenere un punto del tempo o il periodo di attuazione

Description: Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent contenir un texte narratif
descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono contenere un testo narrativo
Description: CDA-CH 'Treatments' must contain a narrative text
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1804_as00155 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem and @code]

Description: Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent contenir un code et mentionner le Code System (CDA Body Level 3)
descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono contenere un codice e indicare il Code System (CDA Body Level 3)
Description: CDA-CH 'Treatments' must contain a code and state the coding system (CDA Body Level 3)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1805_as00156 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:performer/cda:assignedEntity/cda:assignedPerson/cda:name

Description: Les 'treatments' CDA-CH doivent indiquer au moins le nom du médecin qui est responsable pur le treatment ('performer/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)
descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Trattamenti' devono indicare almeno il nome del medico che ha formulato la Trattamenti ('performer/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)
Description: CDA-CH 'Treatments' must contain at least the assessing doctor’s name ('performer/assignsedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00026 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_cda-ch_pa00025
Titel: CDA-CH Einzelne Bemerkung L3
Titre: CDA-CH remarque individuel L3
Title tbd it: CDA-CH Osservazione individuale L3
Title: CDA-CH L3 single remark
Beschreibung: Die nachfolgenden Regeln beschreiben die Prüfungen zu einer Bemerkung im Level 3
Description: Les règles suivantes décrivent les contrôles sur une remarque individuel
descritpiton tbd it: Le regole seguenti descrivono i controlli per una Osservazioni Level 3
Description: The following rules describe the tests on a remark in level 3
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1901_as00157 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: self::cda:observation
Beschreibung: CDA-CH 'Bemerkungen' müssen als 'observation' im CDA Body deklariert werden (section 'Bemerkungen')
Description: Les 'Remarques' CDA-CH doivent être déclarés comme 'observation' dans le CDA Body (section 'Remarques')
descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Osservazioni' devono essere dichiarate come 'observation' nel CDA Body (section 'Osservazioni')
Description: CDA-CH 'Remarks' must be declared as an 'Observation' in the CDA Body ('Remarks' section)

Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime
Beschreibung: CDA-CH 'Bemerkungen' müssen ein Datum der Feststellung enthalten
Description: Les 'Remarques' CDA-CH doivent contenir une date de constatation
descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Osservazioni' devono contenere una data di constatazione
Description: CDA-CH 'Remarks' must contain a date of detection
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1903_as00159 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text
Beschreibung: CDA-CH 'Bemerkungen' müssen einen narrativen Text enthalten
Description: Les 'Remarques' CDA-CH doivent contenir un texte narratif
descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Osservazioni' devono contenere un testo narrativo
Description: CDA-CH 'Remarks' must contain a narrative text
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1904_as00160 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem and @code]
Beschreibung: CDA-CH 'Bemerkungen' müssen einen Code enthalten und das Code System angeben (CDA Body Level 3)
Description: Les 'Remarques' CDA-CH doivent contenir un code et mentionner le Code System (CDA Body Level 3)
descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Osservazioni' devono contenere un codice e indicare il Code System (CDA Body Level 3)
Description: CDA-CH 'Remarks' must contain a code and state the coding system (CDA Body Level 3)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1905_as00161 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:performer/cda:assignedEntity/cda:assignedPerson/cda:name
Beschreibung: CDA-CH 'Bemerkungen' müssen mindestens den Namen des beurteilenden Arztes angeben ('performer/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)
Description: Les 'Remarques' CDA-CH doivent indiquer au moins le nom du médecin qui a posé le Remarque ('performer/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)
descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Osservazioni' devono indicare almeno il nome del medico che ha formulato la Osservazioni ('performer/assignedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)
Description: CDA-CH 'Remarks' must contain at least the assessing doctor’s name ('performer/assignsedEntity/assignedPerson/name') (CDA Body Level 3)
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_entity_HL7-cda-ch-1906_as00162 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:value[@xsi:type="CE"]
Beschreibung: CDA-CH 'Bemerkungen' müssen einen codierten Wert enthalten (mögliche Werteliste: 2.16.756.5.30.2.1.1.8.1)
Description: Les 'Remarques' CDA-CH doivent contenir un valeur codée (valeurs possible: '2.16.756.5.30.2.1.1.8.1')
descritpiton tbd it: Le CDA-CH 'Osservazioni' devono deve contenere un valore codificato (lista dei valori possibile: 2.16.756.5.30.2.1.1.8.1)
Description: CDA-CH 'Remarks' must contain a coded value (possible list of values: 2.16.756.5.30.2.1.1.8.1)

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00028 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_cda-ch_pa00027
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00164 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(@value) or @nullFlavor or matches(@value,'^\d{0,8}$') or matches(@value,'^\d{12,14}[+-]\d{4}$')
Beschreibung: Das Datum muss dem folgenden Muster entsprechen: YYYYMMDDHHMM[SS]+HHMM
Description: La date doit correspondre au schéma suivant: YYYYMMDDHHMM[SS]+HHMM
Description: The date must match the following pattern: YYYYMMDDHHMM[SS]+HHMM
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00165 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(@value) or @nullFlavor or matches(@value,'^\d{4}\d+') or matches(@value,'^\d{4}$')
Beschreibung: Das Datum muss dem folgenden Muster entsprechen: YYYY[MM[DD]]
Description: La date doit correspondre au schéma suivant: YYYY[MM[DD]]
Description: The date must match the following pattern: YYYY[MM[DD]]

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00031 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_cda-ch_pa00028
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00170 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: @classCode='OBS' and @moodCode='EVN'
Description: Dose numbers must be declared by an observation containing classCode='OBS' and moodCode='EVN'
Beschreibung: Lot-Nummern müssen mit einer observation und folgenden Attributen deklariert werden: classCode='OBS' und moodCode='EVN'
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00171 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.1' and @code='30973-2']
Description: Dose numbers must be declared using the LOINC code 30973-2
Beschreibung: Lot-Nummern müssen mit dem LOINC Code 30973-2 deklariert werden
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00172 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:statusCode[@code='completed']
Description: Dose numbers must be declared using a completed statusCode
Beschreibung: Lot-Nummern müssen mit statusCode completed angegeben werden
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00173 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:value[@xsi:type='ST' and text()]
Description: Dose numbers must be declared as text in the value element using xsi:type='ST'
Beschreibung: Lot-Nummern müssen als Text im 'value' Element mit xsi:type='ST' angegeben werden
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_cda-ch_pa00029 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00032 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_cda-ch_pa00029
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00174 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:externalDocument[@classCode='DOC' and @moodCode='EVN']
Beschreibung: CDA-CH 'Externe Referenz' muss mit einer externalReference und folgenden Attributen deklariert werden: classCode='DOC' und moodCode='EVN'
Description: CDA-CH 'External Reference' must be declared by an externalReference containing classCode='DOC' and moodCode='EVN'
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00175 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:externalDocument/cda:id
Beschreibung: CDA-CH 'Externe Referenz' muss mit einer id identifiziert werden
Description: CDA-CH 'External Reference' must be identified using an id
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00176 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:externalDocument/cda:text[not(@mediaType) or (@mediaType and @representation='B64')]/cda:reference[@value]
Beschreibung: CDA-CH 'Externe Referenz' muss mit einem <text> Element deklariert werden, welches das Document Base64 codiert einbettet und mit einem <reference> Element auf den Bereich im menschlich lesbaren Text verweist, wo die Referenz genannt ist. Alternativ kann das externe Dokument als Link deklariert werden. In diesem Fall MUSS der Link als URL angegeben werden, welcher auf das referenzierte Dokument verweist. Der gleiche Link MUSS im menschlich lesbaren Text mit dem <linkHTML> Element angegeben werden.
Description: CDA-CH 'External Reference' must contain a <text> element that contains the Base64 encoded document and a <reference> element pointing to the narrative text where the reference is recorded. Alternatively the external document may be referenced by URL. In this case the same URL MUST be declared using the <linkHTML> element in the narrative text.

Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: translate(@root, '0123456789.', '') = ''
Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: Characters that are not in the set 0-9 or . are not present in a valid OID.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00181 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(substring(@root, 1, 1) = '.') and not(substring(@root, string-length(@root), 1) = '.')
Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: The first and last characters of an OID must be a digit.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00182 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(contains(@root,'..'))
Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: A properly formatted OID should not contain two . characters without any intervening digits

Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: string-length(@root) < 65
Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: An OID must be shorter than 65 characters.

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00052 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_vhitg-ruleset_pa00048
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00191 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (substring(@value,1,4)='tel:' or substring(@value,1,4)='fax:') or substring(@value,1,7)='mailto:' or substring(@value,1,5)='http:' or substring(@value,1,6)='https:' or @nullFlavor
Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: Telecom values must begin with 'tel:' or 'fax:' or 'mailto:'.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_telcom-regex_as00192 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (not(substring(@value,1,4) = 'tel:') and not(substring(@value,1,4) = 'fax:')) or string-length(concat(translate(substring(@value,5,1),'+0123456789()-.',''),translate(substring(@value,6),'0123456789()-.',''))) = 0
Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: Telephone/fax numbers must match the regular expression pattern tel:\+?[-0-9().]
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_telcom-has-digit_as00193 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (not(substring(@value,1,4) = 'tel:') and not(substring(@value,1,4) = 'fax:')) or string-length(concat(translate(substring(@value,5,1),'+()-.',''),translate(substring(@value,6),'()-.',''))) > 0
Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: At least one dialing digit must be present in the telephone/fax number after visual separators are removed.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_vhitg-ruleset_pa00049 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00196 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: normalize-space(@root)='2.16.840.1.113883.1.3' and normalize-space(@extension)='POCD_HD000040'
Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: The extension attribute of the typeId element must be POCD_HD000040 and the root attribute must be 2.16.840.1.113883.1.3.

Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00202 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (string-length(@code) = 5 and substring(@code,3,1) = '-') or string-length(@code) = 2
Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: The language code must be in the form nn, or nn-CC.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00203 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: substring(@code,1,2) = $vhitg-codeSystem[@codeSystemName='ISO639-1']/code/@value
Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: The language must be a legal ISO-639-1 language code in lower case.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00204 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: string-length(@code) = 2 or substring(@code,4,2) = $vhitg-codeSystem[@codeSystemName='ISO3166-1']/code/@value
Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: The country code portion, if present must be an ISO-3166 country code in upper case.

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00069 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_vhitg-ruleset_pa00065
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00220 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (./cda:name) and (./cda:value)
Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: The qualifier element of a diagnosis code must contain a name and a value node
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00221 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore

Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: The qualifier/name element of a diagnosis code must contain a code and a codeSystem attribute

Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (./cda:value/@code and ./cda:value/@codeSystem)
Description:Beschreibung:Description:descritpiton tbd it: vhitg-ruleset.ent: The qualifier/value element of a diagnosis code must contain a code and a codeSystem attribute
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4-errors_pa00066 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]: 9.0
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-08-14T11:27:43.336+02:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00070 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4-errors_pa00066
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00223 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(../cda:participant) or ../cda:participant[@typeCode="IND"]
Description: In IHE PCC Patient Contacts (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4), contacts that are recorded as participant elements shall have the classCode attribute shall set to 'IND'.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00224 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(../cda:participant) or cda:associatedEntity[@classCode = "AGNT" or @classCode = "CAREGIVER" or @classCode = "ECON" or @classCode = "NOK" or @classCode = "PRS"]
Description: In IHE PCC Patient Contacts (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4), the associatedEntity element identifies the type of contact. The classCode attribute shall be present, and contains a value from the set AGNT, CAREGIVER, ECON, NOK, or PRS to identify contacts that are agents of the patient, care givers, emergency contacts, next of kin, or other relations respectively.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00225 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(../cda:participant) or not(cda:associatedEntity/cda:code) or cda:associatedEntity/cda:code[@code and @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.111"]
Description: In IHE PCC Patient Contacts (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4), in the associatedEntity code, the code attribute is required and comes from the HL7 PersonalRelationshipRoleType vocabulary. The codeSystem attribute is required and shall be represented exactly as shown.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4-warnings_pa00067 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-08-14T11:27:43.336+02:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00071 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4-warnings_pa00067
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00226 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(../cda:participant) or cda:associatedEntity/cda:code
Description: In IHE PCC Patient Contacts (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.2.4), the code of the associatedEntity should exist.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.6-errors_pa00068 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00072 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.6-errors_pa00068
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00227 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13"]
Description: In IHE PCC Blood Type Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.6), the parent template Id (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13) of Blood Type Observation shall exist.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00228 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.31"]
Description: In IHE PCC Blood Type Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.6), the CCD template Id (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.31) of Blood Type Observation shall exist.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00229 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1"]
Description: In IHE PCC Blood Type Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.6), a Blood Type Observation shall have a LOINC code describing this as a finding of the patient's composite blood type.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00230 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@code="882-1"] and cda:value[@xsi:type="CE"]
Description: In IHE PCC Blood Type Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.6), the Blood Type Observation with a LOINC code of 882-1 shall be recorded using a CE datatype.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00231 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:repeatNumber or cda:interpretationCode or cda:methodCode or cda:targetSiteCode)
Description: In IHE PCC Blood Type Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.6), the repeatNumber, interpretationCode, methodCode and targetSiteCode elements should not be present in a blood type observation.

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00074 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2-errors_pa00070
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00235 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.40"]
Description: In IHE PCC Comments (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2), the parent CCD templateId (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.40) for Comments must be included.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00236 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@code="48767-8" and @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1"]
Description: In IHE PCC Comments (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2), the code element for Comments is required. The code and codeSystem attributes shall be recorded exactly as indicated.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00237 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:text/cda:reference
Description: In IHE PCC Comments (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2), the <observation> element shall contain a <text> element. For CDA, the <text> elements shall contain a <reference> element pointing to the narrative where the severity is recorded, rather than duplicate text to avoid ambiguity.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00238 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:statusCode[@code = "completed"]
Description: In IHE PCC Comments (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2), the code attribute of <statusCode> for all Comments shall be completed.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00239 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:author) or ( cda:author/cda:time and cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:id and cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:addr and cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:telecom and ( cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:assignedPerson/cda:name or cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:representedOrganization/cda:name))
Description: In IHE PCC Comments (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.2), the Comment may have an author. The time of the comment creation shall be recorded in the <time> element when the <author> element is present. The identifier of the author, and their address and telephone number must be present inside the <id>, <addr> and <telecom> elements when the <author> element is present. The author's and/or the organization's name must be present when the <author> element is present.

Description: Kommentare/Bemerkungen müssen folgendermassen codiert werden: code='48767-8' codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.1' codeSystemName='LOINC' displayName='Annotation Comment'
Description: Annotation Comments must be coded as follows: code='48767-8' codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.1' codeSystemName='LOINC' displayName='Annotation Comment'

Description: In IHE PCC Coded Vital Signs Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.5.3.2), the Coded Vital Signs can only be used on sections.

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00078 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1-errors_pa00074
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00247 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.32"] and cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.35"]
Description: In IHE PCC Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1), the Vital Signs Organizer shall have template IDs (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.32 and 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.35) to indicate that it inherits constraints from the ASTM/HL7 CCD Specification for Vital signs.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00248 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:id
Description: In IHE PCC Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1), the Vital Signs Organizer shall have an <id> element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00249 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@code="46680005" and @displayName="Vital signs" and @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" and @codeSystemName="SNOMED CT"]
Description: In IHE PCC Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1), the <code> element of Vital Signs Organizer shall be recorded as shown to indicate that this organizer captures information about patient vital signs. <code code='46680005' displayName='Vital signs' codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.96' codeSystemName='SNOMED CT'/>
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00250 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:statusCode[@code="completed"]
Description: In IHE PCC Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1), the Vital Signs Organizer observations shall have all been completed.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00251 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime
Description: In IHE PCC Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1), the effective time element shall be present in Vital Signs Organizer to indicate when the measurement was taken.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00252 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:component/cda:observation/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2"]
Description: In IHE PCC Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1), the Vital Signs Organizer shall have one or more <component> elements that are <observation> elements using the Vital Signs Observation template (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2).
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1-extensions_pa00075 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00079 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1-extensions_pa00075
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00253 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: self::cda:organizer[@classCode="CLUSTER" and @moodCode="EVN"]
Beschreibung: Der Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1) muss mit classCode='CLUSTER' und moodCode='EVN' deklariert werden.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00254 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime[@value or @nullFlavor=$cda-ch-codeSystem[@codeSystemName='nullFlavor' and @root='2.16.840.1.113883.5.1008']/code/@value]
Beschreibung: Im Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1) muss der Zeitpunkt der Messung angegeben werden. Ist dieser unbekannt, MUSS effectiveTime mit null-Flavor angegeben werden.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00255 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime[@nullFlavor] or cda:effectiveTime[string-length(@value)>=12]
Beschreibung: Im Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1) muss der Zeitpunkt der Messung mit einer Genauigkeit von mindestens Datum und Tageszeit mit Stunde und Minute angegeben werden.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00256 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:effectiveTime[@nullFlavor]) or count(cda:component/cda:observation/cda:code[not(@code=('8302-2','3141-9'))])=0
Beschreibung: Im Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1) muss der Zeitpunkt der Messung angegeben werden. nullFlavor ist nur dann erlaubt, wenn der Organizer ausschliesslich Körpergrösse oder Gewicht enthält.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00257 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:author
Beschreibung: Im Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1) ist kein Autor deklariert.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00258 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:author) or cda:author[@typeCode="AUT"]
Beschreibung: Wenn im Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1) ein Autor angegeben wird, muss dieser mit typeCode='AUT' deklariert werden.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00259 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:author) or cda:author/cda:time/@value
Beschreibung: Im Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1) muss das Datum der Eintragung im time Element beim author angegeben werden.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00260 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:author) or cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:id/@extension
Beschreibung: Im Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1) muss die ID des Autors im 'id' element von 'assignedAuthor' deklariert werden.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00261 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:author) or cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:id[@extension and (@root='1.3.88' or @root='2.51.1.3')]
Beschreibung: Im Vital Signs Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.1) ist kein Autor mit GLN deklariert.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2-errors_pa00076 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]: 9.0
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-08-14T11:27:43.478+02:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00080 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2-errors_pa00076
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00262 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13"] and cda:templateId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.31"]
Description: In IHE PCC Vital Signs Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2), Vital Signs Observation shall include parent template IDs to indicate that it inherits constraints from the ASTM/HL7 CCD Specification for Vital signs (2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.31), and the constraints of this specification (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00263 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem = "2.16.840.1.113883.6.1"]
Description: In IHE PCC Vital Signs Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2), a Vital Signs Observation shall use a LOINC code.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00264 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@code = "9279-1" or @code = "8867-4" or @code = "2710-2" or @code = "8480-6" or @code = "8462-4" or @code = "8310-5" or @code = "8302-2" or @code = "8306-3" or @code = "8287-5" or @code = "3141-9"]
Description: In IHE PCC Vital Signs Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2), a Vital Signs Observation shall use a LOINC code from the table in the specification. See http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php?title=1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00265 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:value[@xsi:type="PQ"]
Description: In IHE PCC Vital Signs Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2), the <value> element shall be present in Vital Signs Observation, and shall be of the appropriate data type specified for measure in the table. See http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php?title=1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00081 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2-extensions_pa00077
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00276 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="2.16.756.5.30.1.1.1.1.3.4.1" and @extension="CDA-CH-LRTP.Body.VitalSignL3"]
Beschreibung: Die CDA-CH-LRTP Vitalzeichen Template ID fehlt in der Vital Signs Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00277 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:effectiveTime)
Beschreibung: Die einzelnen Vital Signs Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2) dürfen keine Zeitangabe enthalten. Es gilt die Zeitangabe des Organizers.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00278 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" and @code=$cda-ch-lrtp-codeSystem[@root='2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.5.201401']/code/@value]
Beschreibung: Die Vital Signs Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2) muss mit einem gültigen LOINC-Code gemäss CDA-CH-LRTP deklariert werden.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00279 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: InformationInformationInformationInformazioni
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:interpretationCode
Beschreibung: Die Vital Signs Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2) enthält keinen interpretationCode.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00280 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:interpretationCode) or (cda:interpretationCode/@nullFlavor) or (cda:interpretationCode[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.83" and @code=$cda-ch-lrtp-codeSystem[@root='2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.6']/code/@value])
Beschreibung: Wenn in einer Vital Signs Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2) ein interpretationCode angegeben wird, dann muss er mit einem gültigen LOINC-Code gemäss CDA-CH-LRTP deklariert werden.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00281 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:methodCode/@nullFlavor="NA"
Beschreibung: Die Vital Signs Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.2) müssen mit methodCode nullFlavor='NA' deklariert werden.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00282 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:value
Beschreibung: Das Vitalzeichen enthält keinen eigentlichen Wert
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00283 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:value) or (cda:value[@nullFlavor]) or (cda:value[@xsi:type=$cda-ch-lrtp-codeSystem[@root='2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.5.201401']/code[@status='active' and @value=$codeVal and @codeSystem=$codeSys]/@valueType])
Beschreibung: Der Datentyp muss gemäss Value-Set zur CDA-CH-LRTP Spezifikation deklariert werden.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00284 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:value[@xsi:type=('PQ')]) or (cda:value[@unit=$cda-ch-lrtp-codeSystem[@root='2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.5.201401']/code[@status='active' and @value=$codeVal and @codeSystem=$codeSys]/@ucumUnit])
Beschreibung: Wenn in einem Vitalzeichen der Wert mit Datentyp PQ angegeben wird, dann muss die gültige UCUM Einheit gemäss Value-Set zur CDA-CH-LRTP Spezifikation ebenfalls deklariert werden.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00285 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:value) or ($cda-ch-lrtp-codeSystem[@root='2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.5.201401']/code[@status='active' and @value=$codeVal and @codeSystem=$codeSys and @minValue='N/A']) or (cda:value/@value>=$cda-ch-lrtp-codeSystem[@root='2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.5.201401']/code[@status='active' and @value=$codeVal and @codeSystem=$codeSys]/@minValue)
Beschreibung: Der Wert des Vitalzeichens liegt unterhalb des min/max Bereiches gemäss Value-Set zur CDA-CH-LRTP Spezifikation.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00286 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:value) or (cda:value[@xsi:type=('ST')]) or ($cda-ch-lrtp-codeSystem[@root='2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.5.201401']/code[@status='active' and @value=$codeVal and @codeSystem=$codeSys and @maxValue='N/A']) or (cda:value/@value<=$cda-ch-lrtp-codeSystem[@root='2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.5.201401']/code[@status='active' and @value=$codeVal and @codeSystem=$codeSys]/@maxValue)
Beschreibung: Der Wert des Vitalzeichens liegt oberhalb des min/max Bereiches gemäss Value-Set zur CDA-CH-LRTP Spezifikation.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00287 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:value) or not(cda:value[@xsi:type=('ST')]) or ($cda-ch-lrtp-codeSystem[@root='2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.5.201401']/code[@status='active' and @value=$codeVal and @codeSystem=$codeSys and @maxValue='N/A']) or (string-length(cda:value/text())<=$cda-ch-lrtp-codeSystem[@root='2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.5.201401']/code[@status='active' and @value=$codeVal and @codeSystem=$codeSys]/@maxValue)
Beschreibung: Der Text im Wert des Vitalzeichens ist gemäss Value-Set zur CDA-CH-LRTP Spezifikation zu lang.

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00082 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.1.5.3.4-errors_pa00078

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00084 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5-errors_pa00080
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00292 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13"]
Description: In IHE PCC Pregnancy Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5), the parent template Id (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13) of Pregnancy Observation shall exist.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00293 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1"]
Description: In IHE PCC Pregnancy Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5), a Pregnancy Observation shall have a LOINC code describing what facet of patient's pregnancy history is being recorded.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00294 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:code[@code="11636-8"]) or (cda:code[@code="11636-8"] and cda:value[@xsi:type="INT"])
Description: In IHE PCC Pregnancy Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5), the Pregnancy Observation with a LOINC code of 11636-8 shall be recorded using a INT datatype.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00295 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:code[@code="11637-6"]) or (cda:code[@code="11637-6"] and cda:value[@xsi:type="INT"])

Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00299 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore

Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00301 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:code[@code="11614-5"]) or (cda:code[@code="11614-5"] and cda:value[@xsi:type="INT"])
Description: In IHE PCC Pregnancy Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5), the Pregnancy Observation with a LOINC code of 11614-5 shall be recorded using a INT datatype.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00302 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:code[@code="33065-4"]) or (cda:code[@code="33065-4"] and cda:value[@xsi:type="CE" and @codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96"])
Description: In IHE PCC Pregnancy Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5), the Pregnancy Observation with a LOINC code of 33065-4 shall be recorded using a CE datatype containing a code of the value-set 'SNOMED-CT 237364002'.

Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5-warnings_pa00081 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-08-14T11:27:43.49+02:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00085 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5-warnings_pa00081
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00323 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" and index-of(( "11636-8", "11637-6", "11638-4", "11639-2", "11640-0", "11612-9", "11613-7", "11614-5", "33065-4", "57062-2", "11996-6", "45371-2", "49051-6", "11887-7", "32396-4", "8339-4", "29300-1", "8722-1", "52829-9", "42839-1", "42840-9", "11449-6", "8678-5", "8665-2", "11778-8", "11779-6", "11780-4", "11884-4", "11885-1", "11886-9"), @code)]
Description: In IHE PCC Pregnancy Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5), a pregnancy observation shall have a LOINC code describing what facet of patient's pregnancy history is being recorded. These codes should come from the list in the specification (Table 6.3.4.25.4-1: Pregnancy Observation Codes). Additional codes may be used to reflect additional information about the pregnancy history.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5-extensions_pa00082 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]:
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00086 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5-extensions_pa00082
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00324 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.1' and @code=$cda-ch-lrtp-codeSystem[@codeSystemName='soas-pregVoc' and @root='2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.7']/code/@value]
Beschreibung: In der Pregnancy Observation (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.13.5) muss ein gültiger Wert aus dem Value-Set soas-pregVoc (2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.7) verwendet werden.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3-errors_pa00083 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]: 5.0
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-08-14T11:27:42.763+02:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00087 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3-errors_pa00083
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00325 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(//cda:templateId/@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.8")
Description: This clinical document contains an instance of a templateId from Lab Revision 2.0 that has been replaced and deprecated. In Laboratory Report Revision 3.0, dated May 19, 2011, Specimen Site from Revision 2.0 (Section 2.3.5.7, Id: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.8) is replaced by Specimen Collection (Section 2.3.5.5, Id: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.2) and Specimen Received (Section 2.3.5.6, Id: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.3). Previous use of Specimen Site should be replaced in a Revision 3.0 Laboratory Report.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00326 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:realmCode[@code]
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) the ClinicalDocument/realmCode element shall be present and be valued from the RealmOfUse 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.11050 subset, within the VocabularyDomainQualifier value set. In international use across domains the code attribute shall be present and be valued with the universal code (UV). In the US the code is "USA" and in France it is "France" (cf Section 2.3.3).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00327 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:typeId[@root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3" and @extension="POCD_HD000040"]
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) the ClinicalDocument/typeId/@root shall equal "2.16.840.1.113883.1.3" and @extension shall equal "POCD_HD000040" (which is the unique identifier for the CDA, Release Two Hierarchical Description).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00328 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId and cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3"]
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) the templateId element shall be present with a root attribute equal to "1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3".
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00329 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:id[@root]
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) id element shall be present with a root attribute or with root and extension attributes that provide a globally unique identifier.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00330 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: ( cda:code[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1"] and cda:code[@codeSystemName="LOINC"]) and (cda:code[@code="11502-2"] or (cda:code[@code="18717-9"]) or (cda:code[@code="18718-7"]) or (cda:code[@code="18719-5"]) or (cda:code[@code="18720-3"]) or (cda:code[@code="18721-1"]) or (cda:code[@code="18722-9"]) or (cda:code[@code="18723-7"]) or (cda:code[@code="18724-5"]) or (cda:code[@code="18725-2"]) or (cda:code[@code="18727-8"]) or (cda:code[@code="18728-6"]) or (cda:code[@code="18729-4"]) or (cda:code[@code="18767-4"]) or (cda:code[@code="18768-2"]) or (cda:code[@code="18769-0"]) or (cda:code[@code="26435-8"]) or (cda:code[@code="26436-6"]) or (cda:code[@code="26437-4"]) or (cda:code[@code="26438-2"]))
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) the ClinicalDocument/code/@codeSystem shall be 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 with the @codeSystemName equal to LOINC. The @code values shall be one of the following: "11502-2", "18717-9","18718-7", "18719-5", "18720-3", "18721-1", "18722-9", "18723-7", "18724-5", "18725-2", "18727-8", "18728-6", "18729-4", "18767-4", "18768-2", "18769-0", "26435-8", "26436-6", "26437-4", "26438-2".
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00331 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:effectiveTime
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) the ClinicalDocument/effectiveTime element shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00332 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:languageCode
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) the ClinicalDocument/languageCode element shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00333 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:setId
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) the ClinicalDocument/setId element shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00334 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:recordTarget/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.2"] or cda:recordTarget/cda:patientRole/cda:addr
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) the recordTarget/patientRole shall have an address.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00335 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:recordTarget/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.2"] or cda:recordTarget/cda:patientRole/cda:telecom
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) with a human patient the recordTarget/patientRole shall have a telecom.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00336 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:recordTarget/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.2"] or (//cda:patientRole/cda:patient/cda:name)
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) with a human patient the recordTarget/patientRole/patient element shall have a name.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00337 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:recordTarget/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.2"] or cda:recordTarget/cda:patientRole/cda:patient/cda:administrativeGenderCode
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) with a human patient the recordTarget/patientRole/patient/adminstrativeGenderCode element shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00338 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:recordTarget/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.2"] or cda:recordTarget/cda:patientRole/cda:patient/cda:birthTime
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) with a human patient the recordTarget/patientRole/patient/birthTime element shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00339 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:author
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) a ClinicalDocument/author shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00340 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:author/cda:time
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) the ClinicalDocument/author/time element shall be present
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00341 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:assignedPerson | cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:assignedAuthoringDevice
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) an assignedAuthor element shall contain at least one assignedPerson or assignedAuthoringDevice element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00342 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:author/cda:assignedAuthor/cda:addr
Description: In Laboratory Report (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3) the author/assignedAuthor/addr element shall be present.

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00097 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3-extensions_pa00085
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3-extensions_pa00086 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00098 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3-extensions_pa00086
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00381 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:relatedDocument[@typeCode='RPLC']/cda:parentDocument/cda:id[@root and @extension]) or (cda:versionNumber[@value>1])
Beschreibung: Wenn der vorliegende Laborbefund ein füheres Dokument ersetzt, dann muss die Version gegenüber dem zu ersetzenden Dokument um 1 erhöht werden.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3-extensions_pa00087 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00100 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.4-errors_pa00088

Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: parent::cda:ClinicalDocument and self::cda:informationRecipient
Description: The templateId (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.4) is a child element of ClinicalDocument/informationRecipient.

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00101 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.4-warnings_pa00089
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00390 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:intendedRecipient/cda:addr) and (normalize-space(cda:intendedRecipient/cda:addr) or count(cda:intendedRecipient/cda:addr/child::*) > 0) or (cda:intendedRecipient/cda:addr/@nullFlavor)
Description: In IntendedRecipient (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.4) the informationRecipient/intendedRecipient should have a non-blank addr element or nullFlavor.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00391 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:intendedRecipient/cda:telecom/@value) and normalize-space(cda:intendedRecipient/cda:telecom/@value) or (cda:intendedRecipient/cda:telecom/@nullFlavor)
Description: In IntendedRecipient (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.4) the informationRecipient/intendedRecipient telecom element should have a value or nullFlavor.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00392 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (descendant::cda:informationRecipient/cda:name) and (normalize-space(descendant::cda:informationRecipient/cda:name) or count(descendant::cda:informationRecipient/cda:name/child::*) > 0) or (descendant::cda:informationRecipient/cda:name/@nullFlavor)
Description: In IntendedRecipient (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.4) the informationRecipient/intendedRecipient/informationRecipient should have a non-blank name element or nullFlavor.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00393 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization) or (cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization/cda:addr) and (normalize-space(cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization/cda:addr) or count(cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization/cda:addr/child::*) > 0) or cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization/cda:addr/@nullFlavor
Description: In IntendedRecipient (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.4) the informationRecipient/intendedRecipient/receivedOrganization should have a non-blank addr element or nullFlavor.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00394 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization) or (cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization/cda:telecom) and (normalize-space(cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization/cda:telecom/@value) or cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization/cda:telecom/@nullFlavor)
Description: In IntendedRecipient (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.4) the informationRecipient/intendedRecipient/receivedOrganization/telecom/@value should have a non-blank value or nullFlavor.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00395 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization) or (cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization/cda:name) and (normalize-space(cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization/cda:name) or count(cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization/cda:name/child::*) > 0) or cda:intendedRecipient/cda:receivedOrganization/cda:name/@nullFlavor
Description: In IntendedRecipient (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.1.4) the informationRecipient/intendedRecipient/receivedOrganization should have a non-blank name element or nullFlavor.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1-errors_pa00090 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00102 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1-errors_pa00090
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00396 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: /cda:ClinicalDocument/cda:component/cda:structuredBody/cda:component/cda:section
Description: The templateId (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1) identifies a Laboratory Specialty Section of a Clinical Document (cf Section 2.3.4.1). It is a top level section under the structuredBody of ClinicalDocument.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00397 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (cda:code[@codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1"]) and ((cda:code[@code="18717-9"]) or (cda:code[@code="18718-7"]) or (cda:code[@code="18719-5"]) or (cda:code[@code="18720-3"]) or (cda:code[@code="18721-1"]) or (cda:code[@code="18722-9"]) or (cda:code[@code="18723-7"]) or (cda:code[@code="18724-5"]) or (cda:code[@code="18725-2"]) or (cda:code[@code="18727-8"]) or (cda:code[@code="18728-6"]) or (cda:code[@code="18729-4"]) or (cda:code[@code="18767-4"]) or (cda:code[@code="18768-2"]) or (cda:code[@code="18769-0"]) or (cda:code[@code="26435-8"]) or (cda:code[@code="26436-6"]) or (cda:code[@code="26437-4"]) or (cda:code[@code="26438-2"]))
Description: In a Laboratory Specialty Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1) the code/@codeSystem shall be 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 (LOINC) and the @code values shall be one of the following: "18717-9", "18718-7", "18719-5", "18720-3", "18721-1", "18722-9", "18723-7", "18724-5", "18725-2", "18727-8", "18728-6", "18729-4", "18767-4", "18768-2", "18769-0", "26435-8", "26436-6", "26437-4", "26438-2".
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00398 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code/@displayName
Description: In a Laboratory Specialty Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1) the structuredBody/component/section/code/@displayName shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00399 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: (count(cda:component/cda:section) >= 1 and count(cda:text) = 0 and count(cda:entry) = 0) or (count(cda:component/cda:section) = 0 and count(cda:text) = 1 and count(cda:entry) = 1)
Description: A Laboratory Specialty Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1) shall be a leaf section with a single entry and non-empty text derived from that entry, or it shall have no text and one or more component subsections.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00400 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:text) or normalize-space(cda:text)
Description: In the Laboratory Specialty Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1) the structuredBody/component/section/text element shall not be blank.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00401 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:entry) or cda:entry/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1"]
Description: If a Laboratory Specialty Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1) contains an entry, then the entry shall be properly labeled as a Laboratory Report Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00402 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(cda:component/cda:section/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1"])
Description: Laboratory Specialty Sections (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1) shall not be nested. In particular, a Laboratory Studies (LOINC 26436-6) section may not have other specialty sections under it; instead, a Laboratory Studies section may be used to summarize other specialty sections at the same level (cf Note 1 in Section 2.3.4.1.1).
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00103 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1-errors_pa00090
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00403 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.2"]
Description: Every subsection of a Laboratory Specialty Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1) shall be properly labeled as a Laboratory ReportItem Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.2) (cf Section 2.3.4).
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1-extensions_pa00091 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00104 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1-extensions_pa00091
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00404 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:entry/cda:act/cda:code/@code=cda:code/@code
Beschreibung: Der CDA Section type code der Befundart (Laboratory Specialty Section; 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1) muss identisch sein bei section und act
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00405 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:code[@codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.1' and @code=$cda-ch-lrtp-codeSystem[@codeSystemName='soas-repGroup' and @root='2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.7']/code/@value]
Beschreibung: Der CDA Section type code der Befundart (Laboratory Specialty Section; 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1) muss ein gültiger Code gemäss CDA-CH-LRTP Spezifikation enthalten.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1-errors_pa00092 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-08-14T11:27:42.706+02:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00105 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1-errors_pa00092
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00406 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: ancestor::cda:component and parent::cda:section[cda:templateId/@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1" or cda:templateId/@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.2"] and self::cda:entry
Description: A Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) is a child element of a Laboratory Specialty Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.1) or of a Laboratory Report Item Section (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.3.2.2).
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00407 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: @typeCode="DRIV"
Description: In Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) the entry/@typeCode equals "DRIV".
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00408 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(following-sibling::cda:entry) = 0 and count(preceding-sibling::cda:entry) = 0
Description: In Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) a parent leaf section shall contain exactly one entry containing the machine-readable result data rendered in the section.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00409 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:act) = 1
Description: A Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) shall contain exactly one act. This act is known as the Specimen Act.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00410 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:act[@classCode="ACT"] and cda:act[@moodCode="EVN"]
Description: The Specimen Act in a Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) shall have act/@classCode equal to "ACT" and act/@moodCode equal to "EVN".
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00411 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:act/cda:statusCode
Description: The Specimen Act in a Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) shall have an act/statusCode element.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00412 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:act/cda:statusCode[@code="completed"] or cda:statusCode[@code="active"] or cda:statusCode[@code="aborted"]
Description: The Specimen Act in a Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) shall have the statusCode/@code value equal to "completed", "active", or "aborted".
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00413 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:act/cda:entryRelationship[@typeCode="COMP"]) >= 1
Description: The SpecimentAct in a Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) shall contain at least one descendant entryRelationship with @typeCode equal to "COMP".
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00414 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(descendant::cda:act//cda:observation/cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.6"]) >= 1
Description: A Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) shall contain at least one descendant Laboratory Observation element identified with templateId = "1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.6". The observation may be part of a battery, cluster or other organizer.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1-warnings_pa00093 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]:
Last upate:Letzte Änderung:Dernière mutation:[LastUpdate@it]: 2017-08-14T11:27:42.706+02:00
Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00106 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1-warnings_pa00093
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00415 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: not(count(cda:act//cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.8"]) >= 1)
Description: The Speciment Act in this Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) contains a Specimen Site (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.8) templateId. This artifact from Revison 2.0 has been replaced by Specimen Received (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.3) in Revision 3.0.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00416 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:act//cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.2"]) = 0
Description: The Speciment Act in this Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) does not contain a Specimen Collection (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.2). If known it shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00417 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:act//cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.3"]) = 0
Description: The Speciment Act in this Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) does not contain a Specimen Received (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.3). If known it shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00418 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:act//cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.1"]) = 0
Description: The Speciment Act in this Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) does not contain a Notification Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.1). If known it shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00419 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:act//cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.1.1"]) = 0
Description: The Speciment Act in this Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) does not contain a Notifiable Condition (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.1.1). If known it shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00420 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:act//cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.1.2"]) = 0
Description: The Speciment Act in this Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) does not contain a Case Identifier (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.1.2). If known it shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00421 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:act//cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.1.3"]) = 0
Description: The Speciment Act in this Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) does not contain a Outbreak Identifier (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.1.3). If known it shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00422 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:act//cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.1.4"]) = 0
Description: The Speciment Act in this Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) does not contain a Laboratory Battery Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.1.4). If known it shall be present.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00423 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: WarningWarnungAlerteAllarme
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: count(cda:act//cda:templateId[@root="1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.1.5"]) = 0
Description: The Speciment Act in this Laboratory Data Processing Entry (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) does not contain a Laboratory Isolate Organizer (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.1.5). If known it shall be present.
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1-extensions_pa00094 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte

Rule ID:Regel ID:ID de la règle:ID de la regola: cda-ch-lrtp_ru00107 Pattern:Pattern:Motif:[Pattern@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1-extensions_pa00094
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00424 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:act/cda:code[@codeSystem='2.16.840.1.113883.6.1' and @code=$cda-ch-lrtp-codeSystem[@codeSystemName='soas-repGroup' and @root='2.16.756.5.30.1.129.1.1.7']/code/@value]
Beschreibung: Die Probenuntersuchung (Laboratory Report Data Processing Entry; 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1) muss ein gültiger Code gemäss CDA-CH-LRTP Spezifikation enthalten.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00425 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore
Assert:Assert:Assert:Assert: cda:act/cda:statusCode[@code='completed']
Beschreibung: Die, gemäss IHE XD-LAB zugelassenen Codes 'active' und 'aborted' sind für Laborbefunde im Transplantationsprozess in der Schweiz nicht zugelassen. Die Meldung soll erst dann erfolgen, wenn die Untersuchung abgeschlossen und endgültig ist.
Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID:Assert ID: cda-ch-lrtp_as00426 Role:Kategorie:Catégorie:Categoria: ErrorFehlerErreurErrore

Beschreibung: Der Specimen Act muss mindestens ein Laboratory Battery Organizer Entry enthalten (1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.4).
Pattern ID:Pattern ID:ID du motif:[pattern.id@it]: cda-ch-lrtp_1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.2-errors_pa00095 Phase:Phase:Phase:Fasi: allalletoutestutte
File name:Dateiname:Nom du fichier:[file.name@it]: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.3.1.2.ent Version:Version:Version:[Version@it]: 5.0
